description: HTTP MCP Server for comprehensive Python vulnerability scanning and security analysis.

environmentVariables.name: NVD_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for NIST National Vulnerability Database (increases rate limit from 5 to 50 requests per 30 seconds)

environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: GitHub token for Advisory Database access (increases rate limit to 5000 requests per hour)

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM-based risk assessment in MCP passthrough operations

environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic API key for LLM-based risk assessment (alternative to OpenAI)

environmentVariables.name: CACHE_TTL
environmentVariables.description: Cache time-to-live in seconds for vulnerability data (default: 900)

environmentVariables.name: VULNICHECK_HTTP_ONLY
environmentVariables.description: Enable HTTP-only mode with MCP client delegation (true/false, default: auto-detect)
